Nerangs.ab: pas barsom andar miyān-e māhruy nahādan be-har do dast goftan xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊ dahan barham nahādan be-wāǧ-e urmazd wa amešāsfandān beyāri ḫᵛāndan va setāyešn kardan dahan barham nahādan be-wāǧ-e urmazd wa amešāsfandān beyāri ḫᵛāndan va setāyešn kardan

"Then he should put the barsom with both hand on the middle of the māhruy and recite xšnaoθra ahurahe mazdā̊. He should close his mouth and recite in wāz the plea for Urmazd and Amešasfandān and praise then."
